FuncDef: The display mpls l2vc track admin-vrrp command displays information about PWs bound to mVRRP.
CLIs: display mpls l2vc track admin-vrrp [ interface { <interface-name> | <interface-type> <interface-number> } vrid <virtual-router-id> ]

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies the type and number of an interface.
-

Specifies the VRID of an mVRRP group.
The value is an integer ranging from 1 to 255.

Examples: <HUAWEI> display mpls l2vc track admin-vrrp interface GigabitEthernet1/0/0 vrid 10
Interface: GigabitEthernet1/0/0, admin-vrrp vrid: 10, state: Master
ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
When configuring PW redundancy, use the mpls l2vc track admin-vrrp vrid command to bind a service PW to mVRRP and enable mVRRP to determine the primary/secondary PW status. The display mpls l2vc track admin-vrrp command displays information about the service PW bound to mVRRP.
